Articles.Content: It started when I tried playing mods for 1.7.3, after going through all my mods I found out it is not any mods and the game itself. Inside the VAB or SPH I can look around and leave but as soon as I place any part at all I can not look around or leave the building. I can scroll through the different tabs of parts and even select them but they will not attach to the part I first placed. I am also not able to move the first part at all but I can interact with any modifications like draining fuel or changing the looks of the part. I have deleted and reinstalled ksp several times and switched through game versions then back and the problem persists. This is my first time ever posting so I'm unsure if I am properly using the  Forums correctly.
